page.title: 14TRANSPORT
page.content: ROADS Two "A"class Trunk Roads enter the block at the extreme western and eastern edges.In the east is the A34 Stratford Road & in the west is the A435 Alcester Road.There is one "B" class road ,the B4102 ,which also enters the grid on the eastern edge. There are numerous minor roads and estate roads contained in the block. BUSES The top row of squares contained in the grid are well served by buses. However the rest of the block is largely rural and services are poorer. Services noted include W.M.P.T.E. 92,189,164,165,190,191.Midland Red X20 X50,
